alert.note: Alert for Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 7:57PM EDT until August 23 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lynn Haven, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Gulf Lagoon Beach, Magnolia Beach, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, West Panama City, Biltmore Beach, Edgewater Gulf Beach, Brannonville, Millville, and College Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
